description: With its recycled credentials and a soft, comfortable handle, this versatile 2.5 layer waterproof pant features an elasticated waist and full leg zip making it ideal for hiking and hillwalking.
name: Rab Downpour Eco Full Zip Pants, Short - Mens

specs.value: Recycled Pertex® Shield Revolve 2.5-Layer construction waterproof technology with fluorocarbon-free DWR (50D)
